Reference:
Lee SY, Seong YB, Owen LA, Murari MK, Lim HS, Yoon HI, Yoo K-C, 2014. Late Quaternary glaciation in the Nun-Kun massif, northwestern India. Boreas 43, 67-89.

Data comments:
Sample density assumed to be 2.65 g/cm3.
10Be standard assumed to be 07KNSTD (CRONUS generated exposure ages fits published exposure ages).
Sampling year assumed to be 2012.
Group ID based on publication.

expage.github.io - data from expage-201712
